alert.note: Alert for Gallia; Lawrence; Meigs (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 1:12AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meigs, southeastern Gallia, east central Lawrence, Mason, north central Cabell, northern Putnam, west central Roane and Jackson Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 111 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gallipolis, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Ripley, Racine, Ravenswood, New Haven, Buffalo, Kenna, Middleport, Syracuse, Hartford City, Crown City, Henderson, Leon, Cheshire, Portland, Statts Mills, Lakin, Given and Kentuck. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 122 and 148. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
